description: Sam works in building construction and you can tell how it keeps him in shape.He said he doesn't even work out at the gym on a regular basis... rather, he's got great genetics and he eats as well as he can. Well, it certainly has paid off-- he's got an amazing body. And to complement the amazing physique, he's got an awesome cock-- and he knows it. He says the girls love to play with it, and he hardly goes a single day without sticking his rod into one of his many women.Enjoy this treat here, because it's not every day that you can catch Sam pleasuring himself all alone.
title: Sam
